original_text: Their tongue is as an arrow shot out; it speaketh deceit: one speaketh peaceably to his neighbour with his mouth, but in heart he layeth his wait.
korean_text: 그들의 혀는 죽이는 화살이라 거짓을 말하며 입으로는 그 이웃에게 평화를 말하나 마음으로는 해를 꾸미는도다

sentences.original_text: Their tongue is as an arrow shot out
one speaketh peaceably to his neighbour with his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 사람은 자기 이웃에게 입으로 평화롭게 말한다

sentences.original_text: but in heart he layeth his wait
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 마음속으로는 그를 해하려고 덫을 놓는다
